reviews.review:
"I can only recommend this game for masochists."
The game has been nothing but stressful. The toxicity, the cheaters, the suicidal thoughts, the existential crisis.
I got low trust factor for no reason at all. I've never cheated or said anything offensive to anyone. 
The problem is I keep coming back to this game. I have the same experience with Overwatch where I hate the game but I keep wanting more.
